contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map of Russia - Moscow (federal city) (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Moscow in Russia]] [[File:Map of Russia - Volgograd Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Volgograd Oblast in Russia]] [[File:Map of Russia - Yaroslavl Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Yaroslavl Oblast in Russia]] '''Danilovsky District''' is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in [[Russia]]. The districts' name generally derives from or is related to the male [[first name]] [[Daniel (name)|Danil]]. *[[Danilovsky District, Moscow]], a district in [[Southern Administrative Okrug]] of [[Moscow]]<ref name="Moscow_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|mow|adm|law}}</ref> *[[Danilovsky District, Volgograd Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="VolgogradO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|vgg|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="VolgogradODanilovskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|vgg|mun|list|danilovsky}}</ref> district of [[Volgograd Oblast]] *[[Danilovsky District, Yaroslavl Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="YaroslavlO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|yar|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="YaroslavlO_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|yar|mun|list}}</ref> district of [[Yaroslavl Oblast]] ==See also== *[[Danilovsky (disambiguation)]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{SIA|Russian districts}}
